title: book_Love_and_Saint_Augustine
text:
ISBN-13: 9780226025971.
ISBN-10: 0226025977.
Title: Love and Saint Augustine.
Subtitle: .
Authors: Hannah Arendt;Joanna Vecchiarelli Scott;Judith Chelius Stark.
Categories: Family & Relationships.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=YqI3H-TKBGkC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&edge=curl&source=gbs_api.
Description: Editors Joanna Vecchiarelli Scott and Judith Chelius Stark make Hannah Arendt's important early work accessible for the first time. Here is a completely corrected and revised English translation that incorporates Arendt's own substantial revisions and provides additional notes based on letters, contracts, and other documents. "A revelation that may force us to reconsider the traditional interpretation of Arendt's work".--KIRKUS REVIEWS..
Published Year: 1996.
Average Rating: 3.92.
